|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = <!-- Size of flash --> |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4B1G1646G-BCH9; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->

|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43227;BCM43227KMLG, HT1242 P20, 238214 6 W; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad2n = 300 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "U12C304T15" and "REV:0 GP" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :It isn't particularly readable.
DOCSIS 3.0 - Supports 8 download & 4 upload channels
===Additional specs.=== :''from Netgear's datasheet'' *Dimensions: [[Dimensions::7.6" x 4.45" x 1.63"]] *Weight: [[Weight::0.775 lbs]]
==Links of Interest== ===Likely compatible services=== *{{Approved by service|Time Warner}} ([https://www.timewarnercable.com/en/support/internet/topics/buy-your-modem.html '''TWC''' Buy Your Modem list of approved devices]) *{{Approved by service|Spectrum}} *{{Approved by service|Comcast}} ([http://mydeviceinfo.comcast.net/device.php?devid=399 '''Comcast''' device database entry])
